nodes.bodyText: I think this list will have to be regenerated on backport.

+    // checking with Spotless are listed here, by project path. Once the
+    // number of unformatted projects reaches zero, this mechanism will be
+    // removed.
+    //

+    def projectPathsToExclude = [

nodes.bodyText: nit: can we move this up to where we apply all the other script plugins?
